org.ipdr.protocol
Class ProtocolMalformedMsgException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.ipdr.protocol.ProtocolMalformedMsgException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class ProtocolMalformedMsgException
extends java.lang.Exception

The exception for giving information about a mal-formed message. This is used for reporting cases where the received message is in a garbled form.

See Also:
Serialized Form

 int offset
          The offset within the message bytes where the problem was detected.

Constructor Detail

ProtocolMalformedMsgException

public ProtocolMalformedMsgException(java.lang.String msg,
                                     byte[] rawMsg,
                                     int length,
                                     int offset)
Create an exception (should never happen if the transmitter is behaving properly).

Parameters:
msg - - What went wrong.
rawMsg - - The CRANE protocol message from the transmitter.
length - - The length of the CRANE protocol message.
offset - - Offset of where the problem was discovered inside the CRANE protocol message.
Method Detail

getMessage

public java.lang.String getMessage()
Get the detail messages about this exception.

The detail message.
